input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Life is good Women's Snuggle Low Cut Stripes Socks

Product keywords:
Great for keeping your feet warm
Polyester, Spandex
Imported
The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives
Small Life is good label at the top of each pair
One size fits most
Company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit The Playmakers Foundation

Product description:
input_text.Response A: These decorative pop-apart borders come in a pack of twelve 3 x 3 strips for a total length of 36 feet! Whether you keep them together, layer, or pop them apart for two scalloped borders, the strips are great for framing your bulletin boards and windows or for complementing charts and class creations! Borders are available in a variety of colors, styles, sizes, and prints to suit any classroom theme!
input_text.Response B: Improve your comfort with Life is good's plush & cozy Lightweight Snuggle socks are perfect for keeping your toes toasty. Small Life is good. label at the top of each pair. One size fits most. Life is good donates 10% of its annual net profits to its non-profit The Playmakers Foundation. The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B has several grammatical mistakes in it.
